Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, north of the Richland Orchard.
Room.LongDescription: The vast Chateau Richland Orchard stretches out for a number of acres to the south, covered with lines of grape vines. The Richland Orchard is always looking for unskilled labor to harvest some of their crops and scare off pests that come into the orchard looking for food. The Winery is located to the north, where the grapes are pressed and fermented.
